span.strong: Opportunities for free WIFIfor those families that do not have access in their homes.

p.span:
Altice/Optimum
Starting Monday, March 16, 2020, eligible households interested in this solution can call: 866-200-9522 to enroll in Optimum region:

AT&T is also offering 60 days of free public service:
https://about.att.com/pages/COVID-19.html

Verizon announced it would not charge late fees or disconnect accounts for an indefinite amount of time:
https://www.verizon.com/about/news/verizons-covid-19-relief-efforts
T-Mobile, Sprint, AT&T and Comcast are all lifting their unlimited data caps for cell phone subscribers for at least 60 days.
